Richard Prather , a retired auto worker from Anderson, said after the Pendleton town hall that he believed Mike Pence 's reputation as a federal spending hawk would serve him well running for the governor's office. I think he would have been a good candidate for president, but I'm glad he didn't, Richard Prather said. "In the next race, he can run for president."
